meanings.definition: Hold the attention of (someone) to the exclusion of all else or so as to transfix them.
meanings.sent1: The magician mesmerizes the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent2: The movie mesmerizes viewers with its stunning visuals.
meanings.sent3: The puppy mesmerizes everyone with its playful antics.
meanings.sent4: The music mesmerizes her, transporting her to another world.
meanings.sent5: The dancer mesmerizes the crowd with her graceful movements.

meanings.definition: Captivate or hold the interest of.
meanings.sent1: The book mesmerizes readers with its thrilling plot.
meanings.sent2: The painting mesmerizes art enthusiasts with its intricate details.
meanings.sent3: The comedian mesmerizes the audience with his hilarious jokes.
meanings.sent4: The sunset mesmerizes onlookers with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The singer mesmerizes the listeners with her beautiful voice.
